summary: Curvy/Petite preset for bodyslide and TBBP. Unique & perky breast shape.
descriptionHtml:
Torn between UNP Blessed body, CHSBHC and UNPetite, I decided to make a single preset that gives you the option to make your female character super petite, ultra curvy or somewhere in between. I put a dozen+ hours of work into the breast shape to make sure it played nicely with BBP physics. The breast shape on this mesh is very unique.

[youtube]gIS_kz_lekY[/youtube]

-------------------------------------------------

REQUIREMENTS
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666//?]CBBE[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731//?]Bodyslide[/url]

-------------------------------------------------

INSTALLATION: SIMPLE
1- Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666//?]CBBE[/url]
2- Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731//?]Bodyslide[/url]
3- Download my file and drop the "data' folder into your Skyrim directory.

INSTALLATION: ADVANCED
1- Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666//?]CBBE[/url]
During the CBBE installation, choose the "custom body" option.
2- Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731//?]Bodyslide[/url]
3- Download my file and drop "Perky Curvy Petite.xml" into: Skyrim\Data\CalienteTools\Bodyslide\SliderPresets.
4- Open bodyslide++. Bodyslide++.exe is in: Skyrim\Data\CalienteTools\BodySlide
- On the top left under "slider preset" choose "CB++Body TBBP"
- Under presets - choose "Perky Curvy Petite".
- Click the "Build" button (it is directly beneath the "preset" menu).

-------------------------------------------------

USAGE
- Create a new character or type "showracemenu" in the console and adjust the weight slider to see the effects.
- I personally set the slider to 6 since anything above that can be a bit immersion breaking.
- Feel free to adjust the slider presets - but be careful when editing - some of the values are beyond the normal slider limits.

-------------------------------------------------

NOTES
- Any CBBE armor mod with weight support will fit this body at any weight.
- If an NPC's breast size seems too large, click on the NPC and typing: setnpcweight 50 (or any value below 100).
- This file does not replace anything in your Skyrim directory. When I get some time, I will see if it's possible to get this working with NMM.

-------------------------------------------------

RECOMMENDED MODS:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34713//?]TBBP[/url]: Makes butt and breast bounce.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951//?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url]: Allows you to control height, head size, neck size etc.
author: Roshire
